text: Cristian Alexis Borja González (born 18 February 1993) is a Colombian association football defender who plays for Sporting CP of the Liga NOS in Portugal. ==Career== In 2019, Borja was transferred from Toluca to Sporting CP. ==International career== Borja was named in Colombia's provisional squad for Copa América Centenario but was cut from the final squad. ==Personal life== On 1 June 2018, Borja's house was attacked by gunmen; he was unhurt but fellow footballer Alejandro Peñaranda was killed and Heisen Izquierdo was injured. ==Honours== Sporting *Taça de Portugal: 2018–19 ==References== == External links == * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Liga MX players Category:Independiente Santa Fe footballers Category:Cortuluá footballers Category:Deportivo Toluca F.C. players Category:Sporting CP footballers Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Footballers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic footballers of Colombia Category:2019 Copa América players Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football wingers Category:Sportspeople from Cali Category:Colombia international footballers
title: Cristian Borja (footballer, born 1993)
